definition: thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions
ticket/ballot/banknote/CL:張|张[zhang1]/person held for ransom/amateur performance of Chinese opera/classifier for groups, batches, business transactions
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: This is the so-called non-trading day effects.
sentences.chinese: 本文希望研究中國股票市場的非交易日效應的表現。

sentences.english: The stock markets have become extremely volatile.
sentences.chinese: 股票市場已經變得極端的漲跌無常。

sentences.english: Chapter two labored the tinctures and sorts of risk of stock market.
sentences.chinese: 第二章對股票市場風險的特徵及分類進行了詳細分析。

sentences.english: Why does the stock price fluctuates unconventionally during the economic cycle.
sentences.chinese: 中國股票市場在經濟週期中波動異常的原因何在？

sentences.english: The more the economic outlook turns Japanese, the harder it will be for equity markets.
sentences.chinese: 經濟前景越向日本轉變，股票市場將越艱難。

sentences.english: It shall be the responsibility of RSH to have Huikang listed on one of the stock exchanges in the United States of American.
sentences.chinese: 瑞星思達負責使慧康公司在美國股票市場上上市。

sentences.english: Please submit our subscription to one of the stock market journals.
sentences.chinese: 請將我們的訂閱費提交給其中一家股票市場雜誌。

sentences.english: Since then I have also traded shares on the United States Stock market.
sentences.chinese: 那以後我也在美國的股票市場交易過股票。

sentences.english: The stock market plays the role of the industrial structure, through the allocation of funds and re-configuration.
sentences.chinese: 股票市場通過資金的配置和再配置，作用於產業結構。

sentences.english: In the stock market, the participants are all motivated to buy low and sell high.
sentences.chinese: 在股票市場上，與會者都積極地低買高賣。

sentences.english: The level of our stock market effectiveness has not yet got up to semi strong type.
sentences.chinese: 我國的股票市場還沒有達到半強式有效。

sentences.english: Eight hours after the market had closed, the tickertape machines were still tapping out the bad news.
sentences.chinese: 股票市場關閉八個小時之後，仍然不斷有壞消息傳出。

sentences.english: Corporate profits will continue to rise, as will the stock market.
sentences.chinese: 隨着股票市場的走好，企業利潤將會持續增加。

sentences.english: A reaction against short-selling often follows big stockmarket declines.
sentences.chinese: 在股票市場中，賣空行爲往往伴隨着一次股災。

sentences.english: The newspaper report about bankrupting of that company spreads scare in stock market.
sentences.chinese: 關於那家公司倒閉的消息引起了股票市場的恐慌。

definition: private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
